sourcesContent:
<template>
  <Line :chart-options="chartOptions" :chart-data="chartData" :chart-id="chartId" :dataset-id-key="datasetIdKey"
    :plugins="plugins" :css-classes="cssClasses" :styles="styles" :width="width" :height="height" />
</template>


<script>
import { Line } from 'vue-chartjs'

import {
  Chart as ChartJS,
  Title,
  Tooltip,
  Legend,
  LineElement,
  LinearScale,
  PointElement,
  CategoryScale
} from 'chart.js'

ChartJS.register(
  Title,
  Tooltip,
  Legend,
  LineElement,
  LinearScale,
  PointElement,
  CategoryScale
)

export default {
  name: 'LineChart',
  components: {
    Line
  },
  props: {
    chartId: {
      type: String,
      default: 'line-chart'
    },
    width: {
      type: Number,
      default: 400
    },
    height: {
      type: Number,
      default: 400
    },
    cssClasses: {
      default: '',
      type: String
    },
    styles: {
      type: Object,
      default: () => { }
    },
    plugins: {
      type: Array,
      default: () => []
    }
  },
  created() {
    this.chartData = this.$store.state.statisticsMonth
  },
  methods: {
    
  },
  data() {
    return {
      sales: this.$store.state.statisticsMonth,

      har: [0, 0, 20, 177, 211, 95, 15, 10, 0, 0, 50, 89],

      ship: [0, 0, 10, 90, 50, 214, 0, 50, 0, 10, 100, 89],

      sale: this.sales,

      inven: this.ship,

      chartData: null,

      chartOptions: {
        responsive: true,
        maintainAspectRatio: false
      }
    }
  }
}

</script>


<style lang=""></style>
